category.minecartvisualizer.title: Minecart Visualizer
yacl.option.enable_visualization.desc: Master switch: Controls all trails and info rendering.
yacl.option.always_facing.desc: Whether info text should always face the player's line of sight.
yacl.option.inventory_cols.desc: Number of slots to display per row in the inventory render. Wraps if exceeded.
yacl.option.fold_inventory.desc: If enabled, only renders the inventory of one minecart in a stack.
yacl.option.auto_size_columns.desc: Automatically adjusts row length. Overrides manual row length setting.
yacl.option.max_slots.desc: Automatically disables inventory rendering if total slots exceed this value. 0 for no limit.
yacl.option.tracker_time_unit.desc: Unit used to display tracker runtime.
yacl.option.speed_unit.desc: Unit used to calculate and display minecart speed.
yacl.group.hopper_filter.desc: Disabled hopper slots will not be rendered in the inventory view.
yacl.option.accuracy.desc: Number of decimal places for coordinates and speed.
yacl.option.max_trail_points.desc: Max points for trail rendering. Higher values allow for longer trails.
yacl.option.output_slot_change.desc: Output message to chat when minecart inventory changes.
yacl.option.output_destroyed.desc: Output message to chat when a minecart is destroyed.
yacl.option.output_on_increase.desc: Send a chat message when items are added to the minecart.
yacl.option.output_on_decrease.desc: Send a chat message when items are removed from the minecart.
yacl.option.print_inventory.desc: List the specific items and slot numbers in the chat message.
yacl.option.print_duration.desc: Display how long the minecart has been tracked (runtime) when it is destroyed.
yacl.option.print_coordinates.desc: Include clickable coordinates and teleport commands in the chat message.
yacl.option.tracking_by_dye.desc: Allows adding trackers by right-clicking minecarts with dyes.
